name: text-merger
title: Text Merger
description: Combine multiple text files into a single merged file
content:
Overview

This application combines multiple text files into a single merged file. It can process all .txt files in a directory and optionally add filename headers between files.

Features

  • Merge all text files from a directory
  • Optional filename headers for each file section
  • Automatically sorts files for consistent ordering
  • Preserves file encoding and content

Parameters

  • Input Directory: Select a stash folder containing text files to merge
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the merged file

Output

The application generates a single file named merged.txt containing all input files concatenated together with optional headers.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && python prod_apps_clone/python/text_merger.py "${inputDir}" -o "${outputDir}" -n merged.txt --headers
